Posts.Content: Hi Lynne, I have my second dose of FEC tomorrow and I too used the cold cap. I thought it was working until the start of this week when I got a burning sensation all over my head and it started coming out in clumps yesterday. I spoke to my BC nurse and she said it may not all fall out and that I should maybe try the cold cap again tomorrow. I dont know if I dare shave it off but its horrible how  it keeps falling out. I hope you feel better now you have shaved your head and hope your feeling ok after your second session. Good luck with the wig shopping :o) x x
Posts.Title: hair loss

Posts.Content: Hi Helen. I had my left breast mastectomy  in March 2010. Now I am on waiting list for my reconstraction.  Are  you going to have mastoctomy for left breast too or it just making them the same size?   I am sure u will be allright. We have to be strong))   Victoria
Posts.Title: Reconstraction.

Posts.Content: ok, I see. Well, I did not know that it is possible to have two mastectomy in one time. I really hope cancer never come back. very tired from all of it! My main consern is if it`s ok to put an implant in my brest. I have two different opinion.   I wish u all the best and get well! A lot of broccoli and asparagus is very healthy for us right now. Victoria xx
Posts.Title: Reconstraction.

Posts.Content: Oh, thank u  ! My plastic doctor said it is fine to have an implant. still not sure but really want to have it))) Really hope everythin will be allright. Thnax xx
Posts.Title: Reconstraction.

Posts.Content: Hi everyone. Sorry for my English. Soon I`am going to have reconstraction on my left breast. I`am interesting, if some one had a boob job on unoperated breast? I am asking, because I` am really concern if it is ok to have implant on my right unoperated  breast. What your doctor`s suggestion? If it safe or not? Thank u.
